sentence.Network_en: By using the helicopter indiscreetly as you did , you dumped an opportunity in her lap.
sentence.Network_cn: 你这样轻率的使用直升飞机, 就拱手送给了她一个机会.

sentence.Network_en: She inquired indiscreetly after the state of his health.
sentence.Network_cn: 她随便询问起他的健康状况.

sentence.Network_en: The was an intricate case without a clue . People just spoke indiscreetly and we were completely flummoxed.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是一桩漫无头绪的案件. 人们只是乱说一气,我们给搞得稀里糊涂.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 难以发现的的英文翻译 ... indiscreet 不慎重的, 轻率的 indiscreetly 轻率地 indiscrete 不分开的.

list.abs: One who talks indiscreetly or incessantly ., 未经考虑或不谨慎的谈论者.

means.word_mean: 1. without discretion or wisdom or self-restraint;

sentences.sentence: "she inquired indiscreetly after the state of his health"
